name: hyperfy-apps
description: Hyperfy V1 and V2 app archive with extraction tools

scripts.build:all: uv run python scripts/catalog/build_catalog.py --skip-optimize && uv run python scripts/catalog/build_explorer_data.py
scripts.etl:refresh: uv run python scripts/research/extract_hyp_index_from_sqlite.py && uv run python scripts/research/download_hyp_files.py --media --write-index && uv run python scripts/catalog/build_catalog.py --use-local-index --local-index context/hyp_index.raw.json --no-merge-ai-summaries && uv run python scripts/hyp_tool.py unbundle-index --write-index && uv run python scripts/hyp_tool.py promote --write-index
